name: Robert Burns
description: You can get this Robert Burns cocktail at Peacock Alley, in the Waldorf-Astoria. Or you can make it at home.
recipeIngredient: 2 1/4 ounces Sheep Dip blended scotch whisky

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass. Add ice and stir for 50 revolutions.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist the lemon peel over the surface to release oils, then use as garnish. Optional: Serve with shortbread cookies on the side.
